1141211.content:
Wonderful! Now let's begin!

Your name is Jack, and you're just an average kid, on his way home from shopping over in the next town. The fact that your own home town didn't have a pokemart was somewhat troublesome, but with the next town so close by it was never really an issue.

As you walk along the path, you hear a strange rustling. Looking over your shoulder, you spot something you can't believe.

It was MEW! the supposed ancestor of all Pokémon, one of the most legendary Pokémon in existence! You could hardly believe your eyes as you stared at it. it floated about lazily, not really noticing you. This could be your chance to catch it!

You didn't have any Pokémon to call your own, your strict mother never allowed it, but you always kept a pokeball on you. Taking it out, you were about to throw it when suddenly...

"SNAP!"

You freeze. You stepped on a twig, breaking it under your weight. The Mew turns to you, and in panicked surprise, let's out a cry as a bright light suddenly blinds you, and you pass out. A bit later, you awaken once more.

The mew is gone, your chance ruined. How unlucky for you.

But something seems to be wrong. Does everything look... bigger?
1141211.title: Boy

114121131.content:
Damn that's small! But unfortunately, your troubles have only just begun!

You stand, disoriented, trying to get a grasp on your situation. None of this seems real. Then, just as you were finally getting back your footing, you hear another rustling.

Was Mew coming back? Did it realize what it had done and come to save you? You turn around, a bit relieved, only to see the massive face of a Pikachu.
114121131.title: Half an inch!

choices: ... with a flick of fur in front on its head
1141211313.title: It's a wild Pikachu!

11412113131.content:
The creature was massive, towering over you even though it was on all fours. It spotted you, quite bewildered. It had never seen a human so small!

It sniffed you curiously, causing you to back up nervously. There was no telling what this thing might do!

The Pikachu then notices your fear, and tilts it head. Not only has it never seen a human so small, but no human has ever been so scared of her before. Usually they were trying to catch her, but this one looked like it wanted to run. Perhaps this was a human pup? A young one whom had lost its mother? Whatever the case, it was far too small to be out here on its own, so the Pikachu decided to take you for now.

Stepping closer, the Pikachu opened its mouth and leaned in. At first you thought it was trying to eat you, which made you turn and try to run, but it caught the scruff of you jacket and lifted you up, carrying you as it went about on its way. It ignored your struggles, as they weren't really doing much, and made its way through the forest until eventually it reached a thick oak tree. There was a small hole at its base, and the Pikachu scurried in, carrying you into a rather sizeable hollow beneath the tree.

I carried you to the center of the room before setting you down, gently placing you on the floor. You were still terrified. What was this thing planning on doing with you?

Pikachu sniffed you curiously. She found it strange that a human pup had no defining scent of infancy, like almost any other baby Pokémon did. Rather, you smelt like any other human, which only confused her. Perhaps this little human had been on its own since birth, struggling to survive without being cared for. It would explain the lack of scent on him. The summarization made her pity you, and so she resolved to simply care for you herself!

The giant Pikachu smiled happily, confusing you. Its head suddenly shifted forwards.
11412113131.title: ... with a flick of fur in front on its head

114121131312.content:
You closed your eyes, afraid of what was about to happen, only to feel a warm rubbing sensation. Opening you eyes, you see she's merely nuzzling you, which calm you down a bit.

"Pika! Pikachu!" It barks happily, seeming pleased with the situation. "Pika?"

You weren't sure what it was asking you, when suddenly your stomach growled. You hadn't eaten all day, you were so hungry! The Pikachu seems to giggle a bit before wandering towards the back end of the cave, where a pile of berries was located. It grabbed an oran berry and returned to you, breaking off a small piece and giving it to you.

You took the piece and began to eat, thankful to have something in your belly. The Pikachu smiles warmly and begins to eat her portion as well.

It seemed as though the Pikachu didn't have any ill intentions for you, which was lucky, but you weren't sure how safe this was. You wanted to get back home after all, not stay here with some wild pokemon! As you finish the small piece of the berry you were given, you stand up and dust yourself off.

"Well Ms Pikachu, thank you for the food but I really should get home," you say, walking towards the exit. But the Pikachu gets up and moves in front of you, blocking your path.

"Pika? Pikachu?" she asks. She was confused, why would the human pup want to go back outside, it was far too dangerous!

"P-Please! I have to get home!" you cry, trying to get around her but she won't let you.

"Pi, pika pi!" the Pikachu says, pointing outside. Looking out, you could already see the soft light of twilight. The sun was already going down. "Pika! Pikachu!"

You look back up at your captor. It seemed she didn't want you going out at night. You considered this. There were wild pokemon out there, many of them active at night, and it was unlikely that any of them would be as nice as this pikachu. If you went out now, you wouldn't be able to protect yourself! So, seeing the wisdom in her words, you relent and sit yourself down.

The Pikachu looks at you worriedly. You looked so down, and she wasn't sure why. Her concern only grew when you began to cry.

"Am I gonna be like this forever?" you wonder, scared of the possibility. But before you could consider it any further, you suddenly find yourself being picked up. The Pikachu, now on her hind legs, lifted you up into her arms, and cradled you gently, rocking you back and forth and humming a soft tune, a trick she'd observed human mothers use when calming their pups.

You were stunned at first, but quickly found yourself calming down.

114121131312122222112.content:
Pikachu dashed through the forest, with you clutched against her belly, seemingly looking for something. Eventually she stopped, finding a small grove. The place was quite pretty, with large evergreens dotted around, a crystal blue lake, and some bushes with huge leaves here and there. Pikachu stood and pulled you off of her belly, setting you down.

"Pika, pikachu! Pi?" Again, you didn't understand what she was saying, but you nodded anyways, and Pikachu smiled, strolling off to one of the big leaved bushes, leaving you to do your own thing for a bit. And so with nothing to do, you began to walk around.

Your stroll carried you to the edge of the clearing, a line of tall trees before you. You wondered what might be out there, what Pokémon may be laying in wait just beyond your line of sight. But then you noticed something, a further into the forest. Looking back, you saw Pikachu was still inspecting the leaves, so you decided to go take a look.

The trek was a bit spooky, but nothing came after you, so you reached the second clearing in no time. And that's when you saw it, your home town.

It was a small village, with only a few houses. It was a sort of offshoot of a much bigger town, a small little hideaway that allowed the people there to live in peace. Seeing it made you homesick. But it was right there, you could see it! Maybe if you went back, you could find help for your condition! Maybe things could go back to normal.

"Pika?" A cry behind caused you to turn around. "Pikachu?"

There was Pikachu, looking about, a worried expression on her face. She hadn't seen you, but was clearly looking for you. It made you feel a little bad, but this was your chance! You could head home right now, and finally get back to your normal life!

info.description:
A simple Pokémon Giantess Interactive. Be it anthro girls, Pokémon trainers, or even regular Pokémon, you'll find it all here!

Things allowed include:
Vore,
Digestion (You must be reborn afterwards)
Unbirth,
Futa,
Lactation,
Butt,
Breasts,
Feet,
+18

Giants are also allowed, but giantesses should be the focus

Not allowed:
Death,
Scat,
Farts,

I will be removing chapter that have bad grammar, or are only one sentence unless the chapter is simply serving the purpose of offering more routes for other people to take, so please be aware!

Also in the beginning when choosing a Pokémon, be sure to leave an open option so people can suggest more Pokémon!
